FuncDef:
The mode command configures or changes the working mode of an Eth-Trunk interface.
The undo mode command restores the default working mode of an Eth-Trunk interface. The mode command configures or changes the working mode of an Eth-Trunk interface. The undo mode command restores the default working mode of an Eth-Trunk interface. By default, an Eth-Trunk interface works in manual load balancing mode.
ParentView: Layer 2 Eth-Trunk interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the manual load balancing mode.
-

Indicates the dynamic Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) mode.
-

ExtraInfo: Currently, the device supports the following Eth-Trunk working modes:
